channel.title: Operators, Operands, and Expressions on Zen
channel.description: Recent content in Operators, Operands, and Expressions on Zen

item.title: Understanding Operators
item.description: In this lecture, you will learn about operators. An operator is a special symbol or a keyword that performs a mathemtical operation or a specific operation. Generally, an operator expects one, two, or three values known as operands. You must always remember, an operator always calculates and returns a result.
